contentrichtext.text: '''William Gray "Bill" Daughtridge, Jr.''' is a businessman from [[Rocky Mount, North Carolina]] who served three terms (Jan. 2003 - Dec. 2008) as a [[United States Republican Party|Republican]] member of the [[North Carolina General Assembly]] representing the state's twenty-fifth [[North Carolina House of Representatives|House]] district, including constituents in [[Nash County, North Carolina|Nash]] County. Daughtridge ran for [[North Carolina State Treasurer]] in [[North Carolina Council of State elections, 2008|2008]]. His only opponent in the primary election, State Representative [[Dale Folwell]], dropped out. Daughtridge lost in the general election to Democratic State Senator [[Janet Cowell]]. Daughtridge is president of an oil distribution/transportation/retail company formed by his grandfather in 1929. He earned BS and MBA degrees at [[UNC-Chapel Hill]], where he was a [[Morehead Scholar]]. Daughtridge has served on the North Carolina Economic Development Board, and was appointed to numerous economic development positions while serving in the Legislature.<ref>[http://www.unctv.org/election/candidates/council_of_state/treasurer_bios/bill_daughtridge.html UNC-TV]</ref> In 2011, Daughtridge became a senior advisor to new [[Speaker of the North Carolina House of Representatives]] [[Thom Tillis]].<ref>[http://projects.newsobserver.com/under_the_dome/the_speakers_new_staff News & Observer: The speaker's new staff]</ref> In 2013, newly elected Governor [[Pat McCrory]] appointed him to serve as his Secretary of Administration.<ref>[http://www.wral.com/mccrory-appoints-tata-two-others-to-cabinet-posts/11938358/ WRAL: McCrory appoints Tata, two others to cabinet posts]</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Daughtridge, William G., Jr. | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American politician | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Daughtridge, William G., Jr.}} [[Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives|Daughtridge, William G.
